Html: A bit more detail of what you're doing, such as your code, any error messages, etc would help us help you

I can't run 01sample.php

I need an excle file include chart .

require_once 'Classes/PHPExcel.php';



$fileType = 'Excel2007';
$fileName = 'Result.xlsx';

 Read the file (including chart template)
$objReader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader($fileType);
$objReader->setIncludeCharts(TRUE);
$objPHPExcel = $objReader->load($fileName);

 Change the file
$objSheet = $objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0);

objSheet->getCell('A2')->setValue('1' );
objSheet->getCell('B2')->setValue('2' );
objSheet->getCell('C2')->setValue('3' );
objSheet->getCell('D2')->setValue('4' );

 Write the file (including chart)
$objWriter = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($objPHPExcel, 'Excel2007');
$objWriter->setIncludeCharts(TRUE);
$objWriter->save('Result.xlsx');

If 01sample.php won't run, then there's something very wrong, and you should be getting an error message of some kind (thrown exception or whatever). If something as basic as that won't run, then it needs solving before you can even begin looking at charts.

What are you seeing on screen while it's running? Does it display any messages at all?
I found the problem my folder didn't have the permission to write but i still have problem with my code , no error just white page
now every thing is fine , just when I save the file , the file can't show the chart , any help
